org.eclipse.actf.model.dom.odf.content

Interface IStylable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AxisElement, CellRange, ChartElement, CoveredTableCellElement, FloorElement, GridElement, HElement, IContentRange, LegendElement, ListElement, ListHeaderElement, ListItemElement, NotesElement, PageNumberElement, PElement, PlotAreaElement, SectionElement, SequenceElement, SeriesElement, SpanElement, StockGainMarkerElement, StockLossMarkerElement, StockRangeLineElement, TableCellElement, TableCellRange, TableColumnElement, TableElement, TableRowElement, TextRange, TitleElement, WallElement

    public interface IStylable
    ODF elements that refers style elements should implements this interface.
